item.title: openvpn zero length crt openssl
item.description:
Knowledge Base Article - CTAC (Communications Training Analysis Corporation)  
=================================================

Subject: OpenVPN generating zero length crt files

Revision History:
    2015-05-13 11:03:03 - Version 1 created by Paul Rigor

Details: (include steps to reproduce, symptoms, corrective actions, contact information, links and a any other helpful information)

And.... manually you get Error Loading extension section usr_cert

then most likely OpenSSL 1.0 broke OPENVPN.

run the following:

perl -p -i -e 's|^(subjectAltName=)|#$1|;' /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa/openssl-1.0.0.cnf

Ref:  http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24255205/error-loading-extension-section-usr-cert



=================================================
This document is proprietary and confidential. No part of this document may be 
disclosed in any manner to a third party without the prior written consent of 
CTAC.```
